anya-e1010n:18: Cakkavāḷa nahutā ga, devāli gaṇa cumbito;
anya-e1010n:19: Buddha pādambujo ṭhātu, sīse dayā tigandhajo.
anya-e1010n:21: Nanta cakkavāḷa bbhugga, guṇa sanniccitaṃ jinaṃ;
anya-e1010n:22: Vande tappūjitaṃ dhammaṃ, tajjaṃ saṅghañca nimmalaṃ.
anya-e1010n:41: Asubhāya hane rāgaṃ, dosaṃ mettāya paññavā.
anya-e1010n:48: Hata cakkārato pūjā, rahattā cārahaṃ name.
anya-e1010n:51: Adāsi paramaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ, saccāni dassayaṃ divā.
anya-e1010n:56: Ādo phalasukhaṃ vedi, majjhe seyya makā jino;
anya-e1010n:57: Veneyyo lokanaṃ ante, pacchimepi tidhā kate.
anya-e1010n:59: Khedaṃ agaṇayaṃ nātho, pañca buddhakataṃ vahaṃ;
anya-e1010n:77: Iti uyyojanaṃ mhākaṃ, muttassa muttiyā saraṃ;
anya-e1010n:87: Minetuṃ neva sakkoti, evaṃ kenaci tagguṇaṃ.
anya-e1010n:96: Na hi so pakkamo atthi, yena jātā namiyyare;
anya-e1010n:97: Jarampi patvā maraṇaṃ, evaṃdhammā hi pāṇino.
anya-e1010n:99: Phalāna miva pakkānaṃ, pāto patanato bhayaṃ;
anya-e1010n:100: Evaṃ jātāna maccānaṃ, niccaṃ maraṇa to bhayaṃ.
anya-e1010n:115: Tasmā dhīrā nasocanti, viditvā loka pariyāyaṃ.
anya-e1010n:117: Aññepi passa gamane, yathā kammupage nare;
anya-e1010n:138: Na tattha hatthi naṃ bhummi, na rathānaṃ napattiyā;
anya-e1010n:139: Na cāpi mantayuddhena, sakkā jetuṃ dhanenavā.
anya-e1010n:146: Yo dhammacārī kāyena, vācāya uda cetasā;
anya-e1010n:150: Yathā vārivaho pūro, vahe rukkhe pakūlaje;
anya-e1010n:158: Sāya meke nidissanti, pāto diṭṭhā bahujjanā;
anya-e1010n:159: Pāto eke nadissanti, sāyaṃ diṭṭhā bahujjanā.
anya-e1010n:161: Ajjeva kiccaṃ ātappaṃ, ko jaññā maraṇaṃ suve;
anya-e1010n:162: Nahi no saṅkaraṃ tena, mahāsenana maccunāti.
anya-e1010n:186: Mayā samā navā vuddhā, tadāvudhehi te matā;
anya-e1010n:187: Tathā hampi marissāmi, leṇaṃ puññaṃva me kataṃ.
anya-e1010n:200: Uppajjeyyuṃ rujā svepi, asāto dukkhamā kharā;
anya-e1010n:219: Evaṃ cintayanto santo, napāpaṃ kattu mussahe.
anya-e1010n:225: Kare kātabba kammañca, evaṃ so nānusocati.
anya-e1010n:228: Pattepi maraṇe kāle, na sammuḷho nasokavā.
anya-e1010n:230: Maraṇā sannasaññī so, sodheti attano malaṃ;
anya-e1010n:231: Nimmalena cuto bhikkhu, natvevā pāya gāmiko.
anya-e1010n:241: Sati āsanna maraṇe, duṭṭho dosoti thaddhavā;
anya-e1010n:248: Saṃsaṭṭho na nulomehi, svativassu mukho tadā.
anya-e1010n:253: Sasokī sahanandīca, dukkhe dukkho sukhe sukho;
anya-e1010n:257: Kimikhajjavaṇo sāva, bhanto kiṃ sugatiṃ vaje.
anya-e1010n:260: Ganthaṃ vipassanaṃ tandī, kāruññoyeva so cuto.
anya-e1010n:266: Puññe cintāpi nuppajji, nirayaṃ so manaṃ gato.
anya-e1010n:269: Citaṃ citaṃ ihevetaṃ, tasmiṃgiddho sa pettiko.
anya-e1010n:281: Kāle uposathāvāso, so niccaṃ sugatiṃ vajje.
anya-e1010n:286: Atikkantā bahū ratyo, khepetvā mama jīvitaṃ;
anya-e1010n:301: Addhā pahāya gāmīnaṃ, kiṃ pamāda vihārinā.
anya-e1010n:312: Saddhā bandhatu pātheyyaṃ, tadesanaṃ iheva hi;
anya-e1010n:332: Na hāsi nevanandīca, na cāpallo kadācipi.
anya-e1010n:347: Puññaṃ sarati ce satto, tadeva sugatiṃ vaje.
anya-e1010n:349: Pāpa kaḍḍhampi niraye, manaṃ dukkhagataṃ pajaṃ;
anya-e1010n:350: Dukkhā moceti yaṃpuññaṃ, sadā kātabbameva taṃ.
anya-e1010n:353: Taṃ padīpandhakāraṃva, dvayaṃ otvā khukaṃ viya.
anya-e1010n:371: Pamādassanti cikkhanto, tattaṃ guḷaṃ turaṃ gili.
anya-e1010n:374: Devadūte ime pañca, disvā saṃviggataṃ vaje.
anya-e1010n:377: Te dīgharattaṃ socanti, hina kāyū pagānarā.
anya-e1010n:390: Sīdanteva jale khittā, silā mahāva khuddakā;
anya-e1010n:397: Dukkhāti dukkha saṃkiṇṇo, haṭṭhuṃ tuṭṭhuṃ nasakkuṇe.
anya-e1010n:413: Miḷha semhādi saṃkiṇṇe, ati duggandha vāsite;
anya-e1010n:434: Puññaṃ punappunaṃ deti, sandhiṃ na nibbutiṃ varaṃ.
anya-e1010n:437: Puññaṃ bhava matikkamma, nibbānaṃ deti nibbutiṃ.
anya-e1010n:443: Nibbinda yutta cittena, vajjeyya bhavasāta to.
anya-e1010n:446: Bhava sāta vasā tasmā, dhīro taṃ lagganaṃ caje.
anya-e1010n:450: Dassetvā matasārīraṃ, tassā jino idaṃ bravi.
anya-e1010n:452: Caraṃvā yadivā tiṭṭhaṃ, nisinno udavā sayaṃ;
anya-e1010n:455: Aṭṭhi nhārūhi saṃyutto, taca maṃsāva lepano;
anya-e1010n:464: Athassa navahi sotehi, asuci savati sabbadā;
anya-e1010n:481: Kākā gijjhāca khādanti, yecaññe santi pāṇakā.
anya-e1010n:489: Chanda rāga viratto so, bhikkhu paññāṇavā idha;
anya-e1010n:490: Ajjhagā amataṃ santiṃ, nibbānaṃ pada maccutaṃ.
anya-e1010n:503: Kimikhajjavaṇo sāva, dukkhī rāgī sa sabbadā.
anya-e1010n:513: Ekassa pivitaṃ khīraṃ, catū dadhi jalā bahu;
anya-e1010n:519: Ekassa rudato assu, catū dadhi jalā bahu;
anya-e1010n:522: Tattāyo guḷa gilita, vadhaggi dayhanā dikaṃ;
anya-e1010n:525: Eka dvitti catu pañca, buddhuppādepya mocitaṃ;
anya-e1010n:534: Eka kappe idaṃ dukkhaṃ, nādikappesu kākathā;
anya-e1010n:535: Rāgo nanu mahāverī, bālo jano ta micchati.
anya-e1010n:538: Nibbānaṃ pañca paccakkhā, asubhāya phalā matā.
anya-e1010n:552: Puḷuva ṭṭhika miccesu, laddhā aññataraṃ sato;
anya-e1010n:555: Mataṃ khajjaṃ sa maṃsañca, nilohitaṃ nimaṃsakaṃ;
anya-e1010n:567: Yathā idaṃ tathāetaṃ, yathāetaṃ tathā idaṃ;
anya-e1010n:592: Saṅkhatampi yathā vaccaṃ, manuññataṃ na pāpuṇe;
anya-e1010n:612: Santaṃ cinteyya nāsantaṃ, santa cintayato sukhaṃ;
anya-e1010n:619: Tāya santañca bhūtañca, na passati kadācipi.
anya-e1010n:622: Rudato assu taṃhetu, catūdadhi jalā bahu.
anya-e1010n:625: Rāgaṃ hantu manīhoce, khīraṃ assuca lohitaṃ.
anya-e1010n:639: Dāni mandaggi hutvāna, pāmojjaṃ ve labhissati.
anya-e1010n:642: Aladdhā kiñci pāmojjaṃ, pabbajjampi na modati.
anya-e1010n:644: Pure marāmi kāye smiṃ, passā mi passitabbakaṃ;
anya-e1010n:647: Kāye daṭṭhabba jegucchaṃ, apassanto pamāda vā;
anya-e1010n:653: Santaṃ bhūtañca kāye smiṃ, daṭṭhukāmo sadāsato;
anya-e1010n:657: Ajja svevā vinaṭṭhena, nāla munnamituṃ sato.
anya-e1010n:659: Kīdisaṃ maṃ tuvaṃ maññi, ahaṃ sabba jegucchako;
anya-e1010n:666: Santo pakkassa saṃsāro, nanto navassa rāgino.
anya-e1010n:671: Anto gocarikā pakkā, bahi gocarikā navā;
anya-e1010n:672: Pakkā nāsāya uccā te, nīcāyeva navā sino.
anya-e1010n:677: Sakkā sakkā na dassetuṃ, subhaṃsubhaṃ sataṃsataṃ;
anya-e1010n:680: Sakkā sakkāpi taṃ kātuṃ, subhaṃsubhaṃ na dhīmayaṃ;
anya-e1010n:684: Tapaṃ nibbāyituṃ icchaṃ, dukāyaṃ duti cintaye.
anya-e1010n:687: Andho ummattakovā so, nattānaṃ maññate tathā.
anya-e1010n:695: Abhiṇha gāhinaṃ rāga, yakkhaṃ ananta dukkha daṃ;
anya-e1010n:696: Asubhā tula mantena, vārehi taṃ sa bhāyati.
anya-e1010n:699: Rāgampi kusalaṃ maññi, jano teneva vañcito.
anya-e1010n:701: Āturaṃ asuciṃ putiṃ, passa nande samussayaṃ;
anya-e1010n:704: Subhato naṃ maññati bālo, avijjāya purakkhato;
anya-e1010n:707: Nhāruṭṭhi taca maṃsāni, saraṃ sataṃ na nindito;
anya-e1010n:717: Yathā tasseva paṇṇādiṃ, khādetvā visa mujjahe.
anya-e1010n:719: Evaṃ rāgo samuppajje, kāye gandhādi vāsite;
anya-e1010n:720: Anto tasseva jegucchaṃ, cintetvā rāga mujjahe.
anya-e1010n:726: Bījā bhāve kuto maggo, maggabījā hi bhāvanā.
anya-e1010n:746: Gehe rogā putī pāpā, vasanti kucchitā sadā.
anya-e1010n:749: Tāpaṃ jiraṃ dahaṃ pakkaṃ, caturaggi chavāyukā.
anya-e1010n:756: Yathā bahi tathā ajjhattaṃ, dhātū bhvāpā nalānilā;
anya-e1010n:760: Mettā bhāvana micchampi, suṇa buddhavaco yidaṃ;
anya-e1010n:764: Yeca taṃ upanayhanti, veraṃ tesaṃ nasammati.
anya-e1010n:773: Yeca tattha vijānanti, tato sammanti medhagā.
anya-e1010n:775: Kuddho atthaṃ najānāti, kuddho dhammaṃ napassati;
anya-e1010n:779: Paraṃ saṃkuppitaṃ ñatvā, yo sato upasammati.
anya-e1010n:781: Tasseva tena pāpiyyo, yo kuddhaṃ paṭikujjhati;
anya-e1010n:789: Akodhena jine kodhaṃ, asādhuṃ sādhunā jine;
anya-e1010n:792: Yo ve uppatitaṃ kodhaṃ, rathaṃ bhantaṃva vāraye;
anya-e1010n:793: Ta mahaṃ sārathī brūmi, rasmiggāho itarojano.
anya-e1010n:795: Purisassa hi jātassa, kudhārī jāyate mukhe;
anya-e1010n:804: Naparo paraṃ nikuppetha, nātimaññetha katthaci nakiñci;
anya-e1010n:817: Saccaṃ bhaṇe nakujjheyya, dajjā appampi yācito;
anya-e1010n:818: Etehi tīhi ṭhānehi, gacche devāna santike.
anya-e1010n:820: Na paresaṃ vilomāni, na paresaṃ katākataṃ;
anya-e1010n:823: Su dasaṃ vajjamaññesaṃ, attano pana duddasaṃ;
anya-e1010n:824: Paresañhi so vajjāni, ophunāti yathā bhusaṃ;
anya-e1010n:825: Attano pana chādeti, kaliṃva kitavā saṭṭho.
anya-e1010n:840: Hane dosū panāhāni, anattha kārakāni hi;
anya-e1010n:843: Sataṃ dujjana vākyehi, namano yāti vikriyaṃ;
anya-e1010n:875: Santaṃ hi sīlavaṃ dhītiṃ, hirottappena bhāyati;
anya-e1010n:891: Māññe maññantu taṃ disvā, cirappabba jito nuti.
anya-e1010n:897: Na tva tabbisaye nāme, dukkhaṃ mākari cetasi.
anya-e1010n:908: Mahā nattha karaṃ dosaṃ, nibbāyatu sa cetasi.
anya-e1010n:911: Dhammapālo khami tātaṃ, kapindo kandaro pataṃ.
anya-e1010n:914: Nāthassa pāramiṃ khantiṃ, saraṃ dhīro titikkhatu.
anya-e1010n:919: Sāsane cira vāsāpi, mādisāva ime iti;
anya-e1010n:922: Dve usetīti doso so, saparaṃ dayhate dvayaṃ;
anya-e1010n:923: Pahātabbo sa sabbesu, parattha sattha micchatā.
anya-e1010n:928: Jeguccha kkosa nindāni, bālo gaṇhāti akkhamo;
anya-e1010n:934: Nadi kallola viciyo, tīraṃ patvā samantidha;
anya-e1010n:935: Sabbe uppatitā dosā, khantipatvā samanti te.
anya-e1010n:938: Bhave yyummattako sova, tādisaṃ vacanaṃ bhaṇaṃ.
anya-e1010n:941: Gāmamajjhe aḷakkova, tathā māhohi taṃ jaha.
anya-e1010n:952: Idha peccaca nīceyyo, naṃnayaṃ gaṇhi akkhamo.
anya-e1010n:966: Mettā toyena vāreyya, siyā nibbuti sabbadhi.
anya-e1010n:971: Guṇī guṇī nandindāya, pasaṃsāya guṇī guṇī;
anya-e1010n:974: Guṇaṃ nindāya nāsetuṃ, nasakkā koci kussako;
anya-e1010n:977: Dosabbhā mala sañchanno, mettācando na rocati;
anya-e1010n:980: Su sutta buddha supinā, dvepiyā gutti nākkamo;
anya-e1010n:981: Samādhi sumukhā muḷhā, brahmā tyekā dasa gguṇā.
anya-e1010n:983: Sītaṃ karotu mettāya, cakkhuṃ lābhetu paññāya;
anya-e1010n:987: Dhammaṃ desetu pattānaṃ, cando hohi gategate.
anya-e1010n:995: Nākāsi kalahaṃ silā, sadā kenaci niccalā;
anya-e1010n:1001: Sabbe ahaṃva icchanti, sattā sukhanti ñātuna;
anya-e1010n:1002: Bhāveyya kamato mettaṃ, piya majjhatta verike.
anya-e1010n:1004: Sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno;
anya-e1010n:1012: Averā byāpajjā nīgho, sukhī cassaṃ ahaṃva me;
anya-e1010n:1018: Doso mettāya dūrāri, taṇhā āsanna verikā;
anya-e1010n:1019: Taṇhaṃ piyesu vāreyya, dosaṃ verīsu mettiko.
anya-e1010n:1039: Thī pū riyā nariyāca, devānarā nipātikā.
anya-e1010n:1041: Averā hontu byāpajjā, anīghāca sukhī ime;
anya-e1010n:1050: Catuddisā nudisā dho, uddhaṃ sattāca pāṇino;
anya-e1010n:1051: Bhūtāca puggalā atta, bhāvī sabbe thi pūrisā.
anya-e1010n:1054: Averā byāpajjā nīghā, sukhattāca bhavantu te.
anya-e1010n:1057: Dvādase te paricchijja, bhāveyya puggale budho.
anya-e1010n:1068: Dukkhite karuṇaṃ brūhe, muditaṃ sukhite jane;
anya-e1010n:1081: Na bhayaṭṭā na iṇaṭṭā, neva ājīva kāraṇā.
anya-e1010n:1092: Svāgatā vata tebhikkhū, pattā sambuddhaputta taṃ;
anya-e1010n:1093: Gihi bandhana pucchijja, sukhitā sāsane ratā.
anya-e1010n:1113: Iti vuttaṃ munindena, nussaraṃ ani vattito;
anya-e1010n:1158: Natthi sañcicca āpatti, lajīva so pavuccati.
anya-e1010n:1161: Dhura dvayaṃva kiccaṃ taṃ, nāññakiccehi hāpaye.
anya-e1010n:1166: Yathā thambhe nibandheyya, vacchaṃ damaṃ naro idha;
anya-e1010n:1179: Paññāyā nusayaṃ saṇhaṃ, kilesaṃ bhikkhu bhindati.
anya-e1010n:1184: Mahāpuññe ṭhitaṃ sīlaṃ, samādhi appanā gataṃ;
anya-e1010n:1185: Catumagga yutā paññā, etaṃ sikkhattayaṃ mataṃ.
anya-e1010n:1202: Khīraṃ pitvāva jīvanti, jātāpi idha puttakā;
anya-e1010n:1209: Dāyā missaggahaṃ nicchi, saddhamma garuko jino.
anya-e1010n:1211: Lakkha kappa catussaṅkhya, kālaṃ vicita niccitaṃ;
anya-e1010n:1217: Bhaddanta rāhulasseva, dāyaṃ nopi adā jino;
anya-e1010n:1229: Puttā hontāpi dāyesmiṃ, nirāsā tiva ninditā.
anya-e1010n:1241: Āmisesu hane āsaṃ, puttamaṃsu pamaṃ saraṃ.
anya-e1010n:1249: Sīle ṭhitova bhuñjeyya, māditta guḷakaṃ gili.
anya-e1010n:1274: Daharāpi hi miyyanti, natthi vassaggato mataṃ.
anya-e1010n:1279: Etehi caturakkhehi, ganthaṃ sikkheyya saṃ vuto;
anya-e1010n:1298: Tiracchā peta laddhabbe, nāsaṃ kāmasukhe kare;
anya-e1010n:1299: Bhāyitabba sukhaṃ tañhi, tasmiṃ laggā mahātapā.
anya-e1010n:1311: Pariccattaṃ na hiṃ santi, muttaṃ vaṇṇenti sādhavo.
anya-e1010n:1320: Kataṃkataṃ mudhāto na, tadatthaṃ duccare care.
anya-e1010n:1332: Pāpaṃ mākara kāyatthaṃ, kāyo verī vasānugo;
anya-e1010n:1333: Bhūmyaṃ sessati vekārī, pāpiko nirayaṃ gato.
anya-e1010n:1351: Sabhāva malinaṃ kāyaṃ, nimmalāya kathaṃ kare;
anya-e1010n:1358: Cittaṃ vā laṅkataṃ sobhaṃ, sīlādi gandhavāsitaṃ.
anya-e1010n:1360: Sace bhāyatha dukkhassa, sace vo dukkha mappiyaṃ;
anya-e1010n:1361: Mākattha pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvivā yadivā raho.
anya-e1010n:1402: Rāgaṃ chindāti buddhāṇaṃ, saraṃ bhikkhu rahogato;
anya-e1010n:1418: Ihāpi dukkhitā hutvā, te pecca atidukkhino.
anya-e1010n:1446: Tasseva phāsu bhavati, ekassa vasato vane.
anya-e1010n:1449: Pavivekaṃ dukkhaṃ seyyo, yañce kāmamayaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e1010n:1484: Khandhāva honti bhijjanti, añño koci nalabbhati.
anya-e1010n:1509: Natumhaṃ bhikkhave rūpaṃ, taṃ jahethāti vuttato;
anya-e1010n:1512: Puttā matthi dhanā matthi, iti bālo vihaññati;
anya-e1010n:1516: Saññaṃ nāseyya khandhāva, atthīti ābhuje budho.
anya-e1010n:1518: Khandhanāsa manābhujja, mato me puttako iti;
anya-e1010n:1534: Natthi santesu laggantā, rūpakkhandhā dike svidha.
anya-e1010n:1536: Taṇhā gijjhati metanti, māno ahanti maññati;
anya-e1010n:1537: Diṭṭhi gaṇhāti attāti, ete papañcakā tayo.
anya-e1010n:1539: Mame ta maha mattāti, papañcānaṃ vasānugo;
anya-e1010n:1542: Name nāhaṃ naattāti, etehi vivadaṃ kare;
anya-e1010n:1546: Tatheva sabbadā maññe, mā papañca vasānugo.
anya-e1010n:1559: Anattāti girā saccā, attāti vacanaṃ musā;
anya-e1010n:1560: Musāya vivade loko, buddhena sacca vādinā.
anya-e1010n:1574: Sīse pilandiyā modī, sambuddha caraṇa mbujaṃ;
anya-e1010n:1590: Ta dākārena vattanti, avijjo ttharitā bhusaṃ.
anya-e1010n:1605: Taṇhā tassi mametanti, māno maññi ahantica;
anya-e1010n:1606: Yassi diṭṭhica attāti, papañcā nāmime tayo.
anya-e1010n:1609: Bhavayante payojentā, mokkhaṃ nādaṃsu te ciraṃ.
anya-e1010n:1612: Cirassaṃ dukkhitā honti, ārā nibbānato tiva.
anya-e1010n:1614: Name nāhaṃ naattāti, etehi vivadaṃ kare;
anya-e1010n:1626: Tasmā ettha tacovāha, sambuddho na bahicchaviṃ.
anya-e1010n:1632: Ñāṇena chindi tabbāca, tasmā chavīti vuccati.
anya-e1010n:1656: Mukha nāsakkhi kaṇṇādi, chiddā vachidda duddasaṃ.
anya-e1010n:1659: Pittaṃ semhañca papphāsaṃ, hadayaṃ yakanampi dhī.
anya-e1010n:1661: Anna pānaṃ manuññampi, kheḷa tinta madhopari;
anya-e1010n:1667: Etaṃ udariyaṃ nāma, tamhā pakkāsayaṃ gataṃ;
anya-e1010n:1668: Dinaccaye karīsantaṃ, sā sayaṃ taṃdvayampi dhī.
anya-e1010n:1671: Paṭicchanno niharati, tameva nto ṭhitaṃ jano.
anya-e1010n:1699: Santaṃ cinteyya nāsantaṃ, santaṃ cintayato sukhaṃ;
anya-e1010n:1754: Kicca mañña mupekkhāya, saṃsāra bhaya bhīruko.
anya-e1010n:1760: Akiccaṃ te nasevanti, kicce sātata kārino;
anya-e1010n:1774: Saṃmuḷhāte na muccanti, bhavā buddha virodhino.
anya-e1010n:1780: Alaṃ kāyavisodhena, bālova taṃ garuṃ karo.
anya-e1010n:1803: Rattaṃ pātuṃ chaviṃ chetvā, sakkā ḍaṃsādayopinaṃ;
anya-e1010n:1804: Chetvā maṃsa ṭṭhikādīni, dhīro nālambituṃ kathaṃ.
anya-e1010n:1806: Lagganti chavimatte ye, makkhikā sedapā yathā;
anya-e1010n:1807: Thīpuṃ mukhādi saññāya, te pamuḷhā mahātapā.
anya-e1010n:1820: Kāyā subhaṃ vipassantu, dibba kkhināpya passiyaṃ;
anya-e1010n:1845: Bahīva sodhitaṃ yassa, na vanto jeguccha puñjakaṃ;
anya-e1010n:1855: Sobhaṃ sobhaṃ naye ṭhānaṃ, manaṃ manaṃ pyalaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e1010n:1873: Addhā pītimano hoti, macco laddhā yadicchati.
anya-e1010n:1888: Te pahāya tare oghaṃ, nāvaṃ sitvāva pāragū.
anya-e1010n:1897: Taṃve pasahati māro, vāto rukkhaṃva dubbalaṃ.
anya-e1010n:1901: Taṃve nappasahati māro, vāto selaṃva pabbataṃ.
anya-e1010n:1903: Yathā agāraṃ ducchannaṃ, vuṭṭhi samati vijjhati;
anya-e1010n:1907: Patiṭṭhaṃ sāsane laddhā, nukkaṇṭhā nalasā ratā.
anya-e1010n:1922: Taṇhā saddhāna miccevaṃ, visesaṃ jāna tatvato;
anya-e1010n:1931: Kadācipi na duggandhi, sukkhaṃ cuṇṇampi candanaṃ;
anya-e1010n:1938: Iti ñatvāva sappañño, neva kkoseyya kiñcanaṃ.
anya-e1010n:1953: Sodhe citta mupakkamma, suddhaṃ upakkamena taṃ;
anya-e1010n:1954: Vahe sukhaṃ asaṅkheyyaṃ, dukkhaṃ asodhitaṃ mali.
anya-e1010n:1957: Cittaṃ sodhetu mālimpe, rāgadosa malehi taṃ.
